resources.string: This application allows to change the locale (and country) of you device. It is intended to be used to automate tests on devices.

To change locale and country, run the following command in your shell:\n adb shell am start -n com.orange.androidlocales/.ChangeLocaleActivity_ -e language fr -e country FR\n This will set the locale to fr_FR (French / France)
Find more info on the github project page: https://github.com/TODO
